MS MCQs

    Define an AI strategy to create business value in manufacturing - Knowledge Check

    »

    1. A manufacturing company with a history of large capital expenditures is considering implementing AI digital learning applications. Which criteria should be considered to determine which applications they should start with?

      Those that cut costs the most.

      Those that can replicate the most complex tasks.

      Those that don’t rely on real-time data.

      Those that create the most value.


    2. How is AI impacting human employees in the manufacturing sector?

      Workers are augmented with greater knowledge and actionable insights to grow and develop.

      Workers are learning technology skills that allow them to pursue more meaningful work in other industries.

      Workers are more productive after emulating the efficient work processes perfected by machine learning

      Supervisory roles are no longer necessary as AI sensors and analytics oversee the work processes.


    3. A car manufacturer wants to better utilize their AI solution by integrating “transfer learning” practices. What does this entail?

      Use IoT to enhance automated optical inspection processes.

      Retraining existing models to address similar problems already solved.

      Transition aspects of manual employee work to automation.

      Analyze customer behavior to learn and better understand demand cycles.
